content.heading: What is Apper?
content.subheading: Apper is your AI app creator that builds fully functional apps through conversation
content.explanation: Most tools help with only one part of building an app. You might use one for design, another for databases, something else for login, payments, hosting, testing, & more. With Apper, everything happens in one place. The AI builds your app from start to finish: Pages and layouts, Buttons and forms, How your app behaves, Where the data goes, How users log in, How do you get paid, And more — all set up and ready to use. What truly sets Apper apart is how natural it feels. You just speak with Apper in your plain everyday language, and it understands what to build, how it should look, and how it should work. That's why Apper isn't just another app builder — it's a new way to create software.

content.heading: Create Your First App
content.subheading: Ready to build? Here's how to get started with your first app
content.explanation: When you log in to Apper, you'll see a large prompt box in the center of the screen. This is where you tell Apper what kind of app you want to build, just like you're explaining it to a friend. For example, you could type something like: 'I want to build a tool to track customer orders.' 'Make an app where users can book sessions and pay online.' 'Create a quiz game that gives points and tracks team progress.' But to help Apper understand your idea more clearly, we strongly recommend refining your prompt first with ChatGPT. Here's how to do it:

examples.prompt: I want to build a tool to track customer orders.
examples.description: Perfect for small businesses managing orders
